attribute.name: confirmationMessage
attribute.description: Confirmation message to show if something in the form has changed

attribute.name: disabled
attribute.description: If disabled, the confirmation window will not be shown

attribute.name: excludedIds
attribute.description: Comma-separated list of cliend id of the commands which will be excluded from the confirmation message

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: value if set to true triggers the state change notification
